Identified that the application used cookies for user authentication and session management, making it potentially vulnerable to Broken Authentication and Session Management
Crafted a malicious request containing a manipulated cookie with an arbitrary user ID
Submitted the malicious request to the application's login page
Confirmed a Broken Authentication and Session Management vulnerability when the request bypassed authentication and logged in as the arbitrary user

Submitted the crafted cookie with the session ID of the desired user
